original_title: Bronx: Bronx River Parkway - Barker Avenue
text:
(1) and (2)
Bronx River Parkway: A foot bridge across the Bronx River near Barker Ave. as seen from the river's east bank. Bronx River Parkway is a long and narrow stretch of park area on both sides of the Bronx River extending north from Burke Ave. into Westchester County. In the background is visible part of the Third Avenue Elevated extension on East Gunhill Road. This set consists of two views.

P. L. Sperr.
June 1928.
